short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds download links for Civitai models

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Civitai Download Link Finder

Simplify your Civitai browsing experience with this handy extension. Instantly locate and copy download links for models on Civitai.com.

Key Features:
• Automatically detects and displays the Model Version ID for any Civitai model page.
• Provides a convenient, one-click copy function for the download URL.
• Discreet display that doesn't interfere with your browsing experience.
• Works only on Civitai model pages, ensuring focused functionality.

How it works:
When you visit a Civitai model page, a small overlay appears in the top-right corner of your browser. This overlay shows the Model Version ID and the corresponding download link. With a single click, you can copy the download URL to your clipboard, making it easy to use in your favorite AI image generation tools.

Perfect for:
• AI artists and enthusiasts who frequently download models from Civitai.
• Users who want to streamline their workflow when working with multiple Civitai models.
• Anyone looking to save time and reduce the hassle of manually locating download links.

Respect your privacy:
This extension only activates on Civitai model pages and doesn't collect or store any personal data.

Enhance your Civitai experience today with the Civitai Download Link Finder!
